alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:02AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTY THROUGH 530 AM MDT... At 500 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Rapid City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rapid City and Rapid Valley around 505 AM MDT. Rapid City Airport and Black Gap around 515 AM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 56 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
